modName: KJ Tattoos - Overlay Plugins for RaceMenu
summary: Adds over 40 different colorable tattoos for males and females of every race to the RaceMenu.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50032-1-1396962996.gif[/img][/center]



[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/50032-1-1462645791.png[/img]
This mod adds over 40 Racemenu Overlay Plugin (or simply "Tattoos") to your game. They only affect the player character so no NPC will have them and every tattoo can be used by [color=green]males and females of every race[/color]. Further you can adjust color, transparency, brightness and more. You can equip up to 6 tattoos at the same time so there're nearly endless possibilities to customize your character. If you don't know how to equip a tattoo with RaceMenu look at the tutorial at the end of this page.
The tattoos should be compatible with UNP/CBBE and custom races like the Ningheim.



[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/50032-2-1462645791.png[/img]
To run this mod you'll need:

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?] RaceMenu by Expired [/url] (v2.0.0 and above)
• SKSE for RaceMenu
• Optional: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?] Show RaceMenu Precache Killer [/url]

If you have problems getting this mod to work please consider these things:

• Install the "Loose Base Scripts" from the RaceMenu page
• Try setting this value in skse.ini:
[Display]
iTintTextureResolution= 2048

• Set the texture quality in the launcher to "High"
• Install the 2K version
• Have you really looked in the "Body Overlay"-Section of the RaceMenu?
• Load the KJ Tattoos.esp after the RaceMenu .esp
• Install the files manually




                                                                    Here are some examples of the tattoos, in total[color=red] 47 Tattoos![/color][center][/center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/50032-0-1462645136.png[/img]




[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/50032-0-1465641618.jpg[/img]



[center][youtube]3_ykF4Rp4uw[/youtube][/center]
[center][youtube]a1F4uO-aTJs[/youtube][/center]




[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/50032-0-1462645791.png[/img]

I only used assets that are freely available but if someone has a problem with this kind of usage please tell me and i'll immediately remove the file. Thanks to everyone who makes free-to-use stuff, without you many things wouldn't be possible!

 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/952273]KEBW1144[/url] for the awesome lore motives
Animal- and other Icons made by lorc available on game icons.net under cc by-sa 3.0
Dragon Tattoos made by Gloomus
Tribals made by Chris Leach Tribal Tattoos under cc by-sa 3.0
Some Photoshop brushes that are freely available on DeviantArt
AnargonianFromOuterSpace for his beautiful [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41764/?] bodypaint [/url]
MiNiTails for his fantastic Argonian arm tattoos, testing and keeping me motivated! :]



[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1624674/?tb=mods&pUp=1][center][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50032-1-1395155125.png[/img][/center][/url][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40640/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50032-1-1396963183.png[/img] [/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40043/?] [img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/50032-3-1396962996.png[/img]
[/url][/center]
author: Khajiitas
